xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.10 Hetuduka, Ācayagāmittika » 1.10.2 Apacayagāmipada » 1.10.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Ācayagāmittika
Apacayagāmipada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
320.
657Hetu apacayagāmī dhammo hetussa apacayagāmissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
321.
658Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
659Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
660Nahetupaccayā adhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
661(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetu-adhipatiup1.10.3 Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmipada >>
